channel.title: Heeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeelp meeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee ! plzzzzzzzzzzzz
channel.description:
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:365) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) press any key to continue...[/code]
plz this is in my run-server i cannot run my server anymore idk why! plz help me
here is the link that they said on run-server
itemhandler line 365 [code]if (token3[(6 + i)] != null) {[/code]
itemhandler line 33 [code]loadItemList("item.cfg");[/code]
server.java line 62 [code]public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler();[/code]
plz plz plz help me to fix what wrong! ill rep +++ and pay 5$ im fucking dead serious i dont wanna loose this server! this is the best that i made in my life! :( i worked so hard on it :( plz.. :*( someone help me please :*(
